author: smuzaffar
body:
Use  `Eigen::placeholders::all` instead of `Eigen::all` which has been [removed in newer Eigen](https://gitlab.com/libeigen/eigen/-/commit/5dac0b53c94a7b36b5aef609df73453c09ee66bb ). Although `Eigen::placeholders::all` has been marked as deprecated for current version of Eigen but in newer version it has been un-deprecated.

This is needed for newer [Tensorflow 2.11.0](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8258) ( which requires newer Eigen)

FYI @fwyzard
title: Fixes for newer Eigen: Use Eigen::placeholders::all
